ut velut montes ad terram per caelum extendanturextendo, -ere: to stretch.
content.question: In the sentence, ut velut montes ad terram extendantur is translated

choices.label: since they stretch just like mountains from the land
or that the mountains on the land are stretched
so that they may stretch the mountains as if to the earth
that they are stretched to the land just like mountains

content.answer: that they are stretched to the land just like mountains
